sourcesContent:
Weather forecast

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

Loading...

Country
{{ country.country_id }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { public countrys = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { const name = 'michael'; const url = `https://api.nationalize.io?name=${name}`; this.http.get(url).subscribe( (response) => { console.log('Response:', response); // Hier kannst du die Antwort weiterverarbeiten }, (error) => { console.error('Error:', error); // Hier kannst du Fehlerbehandlung durchführen } ); } submitFormName(name: string) { console.log('Submitted name:', name); } } interface WeatherForecast { date: string; temperatureC: number; temperatureF: number; summary: string; }
